title: Keeping ourselves safe
brief_description: Seven short dramatized vignettes on the subject of adults and older youths attempting to make sexual advances to children: “Fathers friend”, “The Photos”, “The Baby sitter”, “Jane and her uncle”, “The Swimming baths”, “Amanda and her father” and “On the bus”.
